Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2011 11:32PM SFNora wrote: I did PT 2x a week for 8 weeks after my bilateral mastectomy.  I thought it was fantastic.  And still do my exercises daily.  I started with simple things like lifting my arms up over my head.  (It wasn't so simple 3 weeks after surgery).  Now I am lifting weights and trying to strengthen my core.  I live in San Francisco and went to a PT that specializes in women that have had mx.
Posts.Title: physical therapy after TE fredntan DocBabs
